thread.section_title: Hostelworld.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hostelworld.com | www.hostelworld.com
thread.title: nenci23 gm

author: nenci23 gm
title: nenci23 gm
text: I completely agree with Alex (review 24/1/17) about Hostelworld not publishing any reviews that mentions bed bugs. It happened to me twice in the past year and my reviews were not published. Although l've had no other problems with their services at all l think it is only fair to let people know about the fastidious bed bugs. I am one of the 30% of the population who gets a horrible reaction from these creatures' bites and l find it that hostels are not taking this increasing problem seriously. Hostelworld.com making alowance for such hostels only makes it worse.
